Reviews.Content: noahs ark hotel offers accommodation family spacious nicely decorated 4 hotel perfectly situated near monuments visit tramway station sultanahmet nice breakfast buffet roof terrasse definitely pleasant english speaking staff helpful manager nice booked internet hotel immediately contact mail professionnal reassuring furthermore hotel organize transfer airport help pleasant stay
